channel.title: Right click on other player

item.title: Right click on other player
item.dc:creator: @Metalnwb Metalnwb
item.description:
@Metalnwb wrote:

[code]If I right click other player, it shows: Attack, trade, walk here, and follow. Is there a way to make it show “SARADOMIN” if the other player is on team saradomin (saradomin = true) and “ZAMORAK” if player is on team zamorak (zamorak = true)?

I tried this but it only shows “SARADOMIN” if YOU are on team saradomin and shows “ZAMORAK” if You are on team zamorak…

else if (saradomin = true) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("@whi@SARADOMIN"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }
I wanted it to show other players team, not yours.
HELP!? [/code]

Read full topic
